data.title: Lydia Shum to be Buried Next to Her Mother in Canada
data.meta_description: The local newspaper today has revealed that Lydia Shum's body will be brought back to Vancouver, Canada this coming Tuesday, 26th February. She will be buried the next day side by side to her mother in Forest Lawn Memorial Park in a private service fulfilling her last wishes. According to Lydia's long-time designer, Benny Yeung, Lydia will be buried in a "new…
data.text:
The local newspaper today has revealed that Lydia Shum’s body will be brought back to Vancouver, Canada this coming Tuesday, 26th February. She will be buried the next day side by side to her mother in Forest Lawn Memorial Park in a private service fulfilling her last wishes.

According to Lydia’s long-time designer, Benny Yeung, Lydia will be buried in a “new bright pink ensemble of high-necked long sleeved lace top and skirt.”

A public memorial service will be held at the Hong Kong Coliseum on 2nd March, manager Chan Suk Fan stated.

Correcting my previous entry, daughter Joyce and ex-husband Adam Cheng did made an apperance on a press conference on Wednesday stating that it is indeed a good thing for Lydia to reunite with her mother and close friends in heaven as she does not have to suffer futhermore.

Lydia is also said to have leave behind properties worth HK$20mil including a villa in Hong Kong and a house in Canada for her daughter.
